title: Order Fulfillment Process
content:
# Order Fulfillment Process

## Workflow

### 1. Order Receipt
- System generates pick list
- Assigns to warehouse picker
- Priority based on shipping method

### 2. Picking
- Picker scans order barcode
- Navigates to product locations
- Scans each item
- Places in tote

### 3. Quality Check
- Verify all items present
- Check for damage
- Confirm quantities match

### 4. Packing
- Select appropriate box size
- Add packing materials
- Include packing slip
- Seal and weigh

### 5. Shipping Label
- Print carrier label
- Affix to package
- Scan for tracking
- Place in shipping zone

### 6. Carrier Pickup
- Palletize packages
- Carrier scans manifest
- Tracking activated

## SLA Targets
- Same-day fulfillment: 95%
- Order accuracy: 99.8%
- Damage rate: <0.5%

## Exception Handling
- Out of stock: Notify customer
- Damaged item: Replace before shipping
- Address issue: Contact customer

## Metrics Tracked
- Orders per hour
- Pick accuracy
- Pack time
- Shipping cost
